title: Self-Directed Mathematics Learning Path Design: Dual-Mode Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of high school-level foundational mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Students access 5-10 minute microlearning modules via mobile devices and participate in twice-weekly real-time online sessions

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% or more of weekly learning objectives in a dual-mode (teacher-led/student-led) environment.
Learners apply three or more self-directed learning strategies (introspective/extroverted/interactive) contextually.
Learners quantitatively analyze learning path selection results two or more times through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
